body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Grey Auto Solutions. My name is Bruce Gray. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Bruce, my name is Linda White.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Linda. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently purchased a vehicle from your dealership and I'm quite happy with it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great to hear, Linda. In order to assist you better, may I please have your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Linda. And could you also provide your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is lindawhite@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information with us, Linda. We'll be sure to update our records accordingly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Linda. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Bruce. Have a great day too.
